subject: CAPY
name: Disruptive Beh Dis I: ADHD
fullname: Disruptive Behavior Disorders I: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder Throughout the Life Span
info: Perspectives on diagnosis, assessment, and treatment.

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Child Eating Disorders
fullname: Workshop: Eating Disorders in Children and Adolescents

subject: CAPY
name: Treatment Interventions
fullname: Assessment and Treatment Interventions: Anxiety and Depression in Children and Adolescents
info: Characteristics of depression and suicidal behavior in children/adolescents. Methods of crisis intervention, treatment, and prevention.

subject: CAPY
name: Eat Disorders/Child & Adoles
fullname: Eating Disorders in Children and Adolescents: Medical and Psychological Perspectives.
info: Clinical characteristics of anorexia, bulimia nervosa in children/adolescents. Etiological factors, multidimensional treatment approaches.

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Disrup Beh Disorders II
fullname: Workshop: Disruptive Behavioral Disorders II

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Dev Dis: Etiol/Assess
fullname: Workshop: Developmental Disorders: Perspectives on Etiology, Assessment, and Treatment

subject: CAPY
name: Disruptive Beh Disorders IV
fullname: Treatments for Children and Adolescents With ADHD and Disruptive Behavior Disorders
info: Mechanisms, treatments. Behavioral management, cognitive-behavioral therapy, classroom accommodations, social skills training, coaching, pharmacological management.

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp:Child/Adol Psychotherapy
fullname: Workshop: Psychotherapy in Children and Adolescents
info: Schools of psychotherapeutic intervention. Child-focused, interpersonal, behavioral/cognitive-behavioral, and family systems therapy. Engaging children/families. Disseminating evidence-based therapeutic approaches.

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Develop Neuropsychiatry
fullname: Workshop: Developmental Neuropsychiatry

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Comp Enhance Training
fullname: Workshop: Competence Enhancement Training Programs for Children With Disruptive Behavior
info: Training.

subject: CAPY
name: Assess of Anxiety & Depressive
fullname: Assessment of Anxiety and Depressive Disorders in Children and Adolescents
info: Various manifestations of anxiety in children. Separation anxiety, obsessive-compulsive disorders, specific phobias, generalized anxiety. Developmental patterns of childhood fears/anxiety. Cognitive-behavioral and psychosocial interventions.

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Developmental Dyslexia
fullname: Workshop: Developmental Dyslexia: Theory, Research, and Clinical Differentiation
info: Developmental Dyslexia workshop

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp:Disruptive Beh Dis V
fullname: Workshop: Disruptive Behavioral Disorders V
info: Theoretical basis, therapy outcome research literature related to CBT.  Problem-solving techniques, verbal self-instruction training, attributional retaining, stress inoculation procedures. Procedures applied to common problems experienced by disruptive children/adolescents. Anger/frustration management, conflict resolution, interpersonal problem-solving, self-esteem enhancement, negative thought/feeling management.

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp:Disruptive Beh Dis III
fullname: Workshop: Disruptive Behavioral Disorders III
info: Disruptive behavior.

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Prevention Science II
fullname: Workshop: Prevention Science II
info: Prevention.

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Behav Probs Preschool
fullname: Workshop: Behavior Problems in Preschool Children

subject: CAPY
name: Dis. Beh. Dis. VI
fullname: Disruptive Behavioral Disorders VI: Behavioral Management Interventions
info: Review of applied behavioral analysis, its application in treating children's aggressive, hyperactive, and oppositional behavior. Contingency management techniques. Behavior treatment augmentations for parent well-being.

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp:Prevention Science I
fullname: Workshop in Prevention Science I: Risk Factors, Protective Factors, and Models of Disorder

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp:Multicult Iss Child Psy
fullname: Workshop: Multicultural Issues in Assessment and Treatment of Children With Psychiatric Problems

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Child Abuse/Neglect
fullname: Workshop: Child Abuse/Neglect and Childhood Psychopathology: Implications for Assessment/Treatment
info: Types of abuse/neglect. Effects of abuse on children's psychological development. Child, parent/family, and social factors that place children at risk for abuse/neglect. Assessment/intervention approaches for working with abused children and their families.

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Innovative Methods
fullname: Workshop: Innovative Methods in Psychotherapy

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Meas/Assess Psychopath
fullname: Workshop: Methods of Measurement and Assessment in Psychopathology

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Prevention Science III
fullname: Workshop: Prevention Science III
info: Behaviors/mechanisms related to peer rejection. Social skills interventions for promoting positive relationships and for building meaningful friendships.

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Prevention Science IV
fullname: Workshop: Prevention Science IV

subject: CAPY
name: Wkshp: Personality/Soc Dev
fullname: Workshop: Personality and Social Development

subject: CAPY
name: Dis Beh Dis VI
fullname: Disruptive Behavioral Disorders VI: Behavioral Management Interventions
info: Applied behavioral analysis and its application in treating children's aggressive, hyperactive, and oppositional behavior. Contingency management techniques for home/school. Behavior treatment augmentations to improve parent psychological well-being.

subject: CAPY
name: Summer Practicum
fullname: Summer Practicum on Cognitive-Behavioral Therapies for Children and Adolescents
info: Problem-solving techniques, verbal self-instruction training, attributional retraining. Stress inoculation procedures applied to common problems experienced by disruptive children/adolescents. Anger/frustration management, conflict resolution, interpersonal problem-solving, self-esteem enhancement, negative feeling/thought management. Lectures, readings, supervised field experience. Take-home exam.

subject: CAPY
name: Play Therapy
fullname: Introduction to Play Therapy
info: Play explored from normal developmental perspective. Play as powerful modality in treatment of mental health problems in children and in families. Play Therapy with adults. Case Studies, group participation.

subject: CAPY
name: Summer Prevention II
fullname: Summer Practicum in Prevention Science II: Building Friendships and Peer Relationship Skills
info: Behaviors/mechanisms related to peer rejection. Social skills interventions for promoting positive relationships and building meaningful friendships. Assignment worked out with instructor. Final exam.

subject: CAPY
name: ADHD:Diagn, Assess, & Develop
fullname: ADHD Throughout the Life Span: Perspectives on Diagnosis, Assessment, and Developmental Course
info: ADHD, from its earliest presentation to its later adult manifestations.  Clinical depression, diagnostic criteria. Disorders that commonly coexist with ADHD. Standard assessment procedures for making a diagnosis. Developmental changes in clinical procedures.prereq: Upper div

subject: CAPY
name: Hm&Sch-Based Interventions
fullname: Aggression, Disruption, and Oppositional Behavior in Children and Adolescents
info: Principles of applied behavioral analysis. Specific behavioral programs adapted for treatment of children's aggressive, disruptive, and oppositional behavior. Applications to home/school settings.

subject: CAPY
name: Dev & Prev Antisocial/Delinque
fullname: Prevention of Violence and Antisocial Behavior in Children and Adolescents: Concepts, Principles
info: Description/epidemiology of antisocial behavior in children/adolescents. Developmental theories of antisocial behavior. Application of principles/methods of prevention science.

subject: CAPY
name: Bldg Friend-Peer Relat Skills
fullname: Building Friendships and Peer Relationship Skills: Interventions for Socially Rejected Children
info: Basic milestones in social development.  Behaviors/mechanisms leading to peer acceptance/rejection during childhood. Strategies for promoting social skill acquisition. Behavioral, social-cognitive, and emotional-regulation intervention approaches.

subject: CAPY
name: Prin & Prof of Psychopathology
fullname: Principles and Profiles of Child and Adolescent Psychopathlogy
info: Normal/abnormal development in children/adolescents.

subject: CAPY
name: Aggress & Conduct Problems
fullname: Aggression and Conduct Problems in Children and Adolescents
info: Characteristics, developmental course, and associated risk factors in children with aggression/conduct problems. Developmental pathways of aggression/conduct problems. Biological, parent/family, social/peer, and contextual (e.g., neighborhood, school, societal) causes/correlates. Development of resilience in children who face risk factors. Developmentally-focused, multi-systemic model of intervention.

subject: CAPY
name: Interve for Aggres Condt Prob
fullname: Child-Focused Interventions for Aggression and Conduct Problems in Children and Adolescents
info: Practices of intervention for practitioners who work in school, community, clinical, and other service delivery sectors where children with aggression/conduct problems end up being served. Overview of problems. Three areas of child-focused interventions.

subject: CAPY
name: Parent/Family Interventions
fullname: Parent/Family/Contextually-Focused Interventions: Aggression/Misconduct in Children/Adolescents
info: Practices/intervention for school, community, clinical, and service delivery sectors where children with aggression/conduct problems are served. Overview of problems. Five areas of parent/family and contextually-focused interventions. Strategies for engaging families in intervention. Reducing barriers, making interventions culturally compatible.

subject: CAPY
name: ADHD: Current Treatment
fullname: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder Throughout the Life Span: Current Perspectives on Treatment
info: Standard medication, psychosocial, and educational interventions. Recent advances in long-acting stimulant medications. Setting up behavioral programs in home/school. Educational accommodations in school. Coaching. Cognitive-behavioral/neuro-biofeedback therapies.

subject: CAPY
name: Interv & Prac/Vio & Antisocial
fullname: Preventing Violence and Antisocial Behavior in Children and Adolescents: Interventions, Practices
info: Community-/school-based intervention programs aimed at preventing antisocial behavior.prereq: Community and school-based intervention programs aimed at the prevention of antisocial behavior are reviewed and evaluated.

subject: CAPY
name: Suicide Prevention
fullname: Suicide Prevention: Examining What Interventions May Alter Suicide Risk
info: Suicide is examined from a range of perspectives by understanding differences across sex, development, and culture.  Suicide prevention techniques are discussed and controversies in the field will be highlighted.  Group participation is encouraged.

subject: CAPY
name: Children and Domestic Violence
fullname: Children's Exposure to Domestic Violence: Effects on Child Functioning, Treatment Implications
info: Efects of exposure to domestic violence in context of development, from infancy to late adolescence.  Assessment strategies, best practices in intervention/prevention for vulnerable children and adolescents.  Multidisciplinary approaches to working with children exposed to violence (e.g., judicial, medical, law enforcement partnerships).

subject: CAPY
name: Skills-Preventive Intervention
fullname: Prevention Programming: Learning the Skills to Implement a Preventive Intervention
info: Early intervention to reduce antisocial and risk taking behaviors (e.g., suicide, unsafe sex) in teenagers. "Early Risers Skills for Success" program as model for teaching techniques of early prevention. Social-emotional skill training, academic enrichment, monitoring/mentoring, behavioral management techniques group settings, techniques to support/educate parents of a risk children.

subject: CAPY
name: Serious Emotional Disturbance
fullname: Serious Emotional Disturbance in Children and Adolescents
info: Anxiety, mood, behavioral and trauma disorders. Case examples. Cognitive behavioral therapy, play therapy, behavior modification, parent-child interaction therapy, family Therapy. Discussion, exercises, session videotapes.

subject: CAPY
name: Childhood Psychiatric Disorder
fullname: Childhood Psychiatric Disorders: Case Studies and Interventions
info: Anxiety, mood, behavioral and trauma disorders. Case examples. Cognitive behavioral therapy, play therapy, behavior modification, parent-child interaction therapy, family Therapy. Discussion, exercises, session videotapes.

subject: CAPY
name: Diag Prac Child/Adol Psychiatr
fullname: Diagnostic Practicum in Child and Adolescent Psychiatry
info: Multidisciplinary evaluations of children, adolescents, and their families are presented for discussion, dynamic and diagnostic formulations, and disposition planning in a conference setting.  Consultation to schools, residential treatment centers, and community agencies may be included.prereq: instr consent

subject: CAPY
name: CAPy for Psychology
fullname: Child and Adolescent Psychiatry for Psychology Interns: Fairview-University Medical Center
info: Assessment/therapeutic interventions with children, adolescents, and families in child/adolescent psychiatric settings.prereq: instr consent

subject: CAPY
name: Outpatient Clinical Child/Adol
fullname: Outpatient Clinical Child and Adolescent Psychiatry for Primary Care Physicians
info: Supervised diagnostic and therapeutic experiences in an outpatient setting. Consultation to schools, residential treatment centers, and community agencies may be included.prereq: cr ar, reg med

subject: CAPY
name: CAPy Intro Readings/Research
fullname: Introductory Readings and Research Methods in Child, Adolescent, and Family Psychiatry
info: Child development, diagnostic/therapeutic techniques, psychopathology. Readings/discussions with faculty.prereq: Med student, instr consent

subject: CAPY
name: Acting Intern Clin Child Psych
fullname: Acting Internship Clinical Child Psychiatry
info: In this elective, the student will have an opportunity to experience the clinical practice of child and adolescent psychiatry across settings. Students will be exposed to a broad range of child and adolescent disorders and will assume responsibility for patient management commensurate with their demonstrated ability and initiative.

subject: CAPY
name: Child & Adol Psych Outpatient
fullname: Outpatient Elective in Child and Adolescent Psychiatry
info: Students rotate through various clinical sites and work with general psychiatry residents, child/adolescent psychiatry fellows, and staff psychiatrists. Diagnosis/treatment of psychopathology seen in children/adolescents.

subject: CAPY
name: Intro: Child Psychiatry
fullname: Directed Study, Anesthesia Project: Clinical
info: tbd
